name: Funny Scoreboard
description:
Who didn't want to own a scoreboard for games like Tablesoccer, Tableicehockey, Billard, Kicker or other result based fan games? This app is a fun app on the one hand. On the other hand it shows the results and also has an integrated timer.

Features:
- three designs (Video-board, LED-board or hand-board)
- timer (can be set to 1, 2, 3, 5, 10, 20, 30, 45 and 90 minutes)
- results can be set from one to 99 and can be corrected if wrong
- naming of the home team and the visitors
